name: Milky Way (rock0n)
description:
Uppss someone just slipped!  Help our lovely ice-cream to go back to his freezer.

Milky Way is a platform adventure game created in 48-hour for Global Game Jam 2021 from indie game developers. Enjoy!

GitHub Link: https://github.com/Team-Meetup/ggj-21

CREDITS:
